## NO\_CONNECTION\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of NoConnectionInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NO_CONNECTION_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
